about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer with 5 years of experience and a focus on solving complex problems through structured thinking. I like to design systems from the ground up, understand how technologies work, and make well-informed decisions before writing code. I'm a collaborative team player who values clear communication and believes cooperation is our best tool to build purposeful tech.

about.point2: Experience with cloud integrations, embedded systems and MQTT messaging
about.point3: Theoretical-practical learner: I understand before I apply
about.point4: I believe we can use our knowledge to help people
